hero.title: Professional Workplace Headshots
hero.subtitle: We Come to You. Simple. Efficient. Stress-Free.
hero.description: Elevate your company's professional image with cohesive, high-quality workplace headshots. I bring the studio to your office, making it effortless for your entire team to get polished, professional photos—all in one convenient session.

benefits.title: Why Companies Choose On-Site Workplace Headshots

items.title: We Come to You
items.description: No need for your team to travel. I bring professional studio-quality equipment directly to your office, saving everyone time and hassle.

items.title: Efficient & Fast
items.description: Minimal disruption to your workday. Each team member gets professional photos in just 10-15 minutes with my streamlined process.

items.title: Consistent Branding
items.description: Unified look across your entire team's headshots. Perfect for websites, LinkedIn, marketing materials, and company directories.

items.title: Employee Morale Boost
items.description: Professional headshots are a valuable employee perk that shows you invest in your team's professional development and personal brand.

items.title: Expert Guidance
items.description: I coach everyone through posing and expressions—even those who are camera-shy. Everyone looks confident and professional.

items.title: Quick Turnaround
items.description: Professionally retouched images delivered within 7-10 business days. All files optimized for print, web, and social media.

steps.title: Schedule Your Session
steps.description: Contact me for a custom quote based on your team size. We'll find a date that works for your schedule—I'm flexible and can accommodate multiple days if needed for larger teams.

steps.title: I Arrive & Set Up
steps.description: I bring all professional equipment to your location. Setup takes about 30 minutes in a conference room or designated space. Your team continues working until it's their turn.

steps.title: Quick, Professional Sessions
steps.description: Each team member spends just 10-15 minutes with me. I guide them through poses and capture multiple professional shots. No stress, no awkwardness—just great results.

steps.title: Review & Select
steps.description: Your team views their proofs in a private online gallery. They can select their favorite shots, and I handle all professional retouching.

steps.title: Receive Polished Images
steps.description: Within 7-10 business days, receive all final, professionally retouched images. High-resolution files ready for any use—website, social media, print, or email signatures.

cta.title: Ready to Invest in Your Team?
cta.description: Let's create professional, cohesive headshots that elevate your company's brand and give your team the gift of a polished professional image.
